title: Penance skirt

properties.name: description
properties.value: A penance skirt is a piece of armour that requires level 60 Ranged and level 40 Defence to wear. Through participating in the Barbarian Assault mini-game, players who earn 375 honour points in each of the four roles, and who have killed the Penance Queen, can purchase the skirt from Commander Connad, located on the main floor of the Barbarian Outpost.

SMW Subobject for NormalExamine: A skirt made from the skin of a Penance Ranger.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Penance skirtUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Penance skirt.pngWeight: 3.000Value: 65005Version anchor: NormalRelease date: 4 January 2007Item ID: 10555

A penance skirt is a piece of armour that requires level 60 Ranged and level 40 Defence to wear. Through participating in the Barbarian Assault mini-game, players who earn 375 honour points in each of the four roles, and who have killed the Penance Queen, can purchase the skirt from Commander Connad, located on the main floor of the Barbarian Outpost.

If the player dies below level 20 Wilderness, it will remain in the player's inventory. However, the item will be unusable and must be repaired with 20,000 coins by using the item on Perdu.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
20 August â€“
2 October 2014

The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.

8 August 2013
(update)

Some feedback changes have been made to the config costs of the fire cape, rune defender and penance items, including the penance skirt.

2 August 2013
(update | poll)

The item's value was increased from 8,000 to 65,005 so it is protected over rune armour upon death.

22 February 2013
(update)

This content was included when the Old School RuneScape servers officially launched.
